episode.title: Northbrook National Insurance Company v. Brewer

turn.speaker: william_h_rehnquist
turn.label: Chief Justice Rehnquist
turn.text: The opinion of the Court in No. 88-995, Northbrook National Insurance Company against Brewer will be announced by Justice Marshall.

turn.speaker: thurgood_marshall
turn.label: Justice Thurgood Marshall
turn.text: In this case, the federal diversity statute provides that in a direct action against a liability insurer, the insurer shall be deemed a citizen of the same state as the insured for purposes of diversity jurisdiction.
Today, we hold that this proviso does not apply to a Texas Workers' Compensation action brought in Federal Court by another state insurer.
We, therefore, reverse the judgment of the Court of Appeals.
Justice Stevens has filed a dissenting opinion.
